name: COUNTER_VIRUS
description:
You are one of the few left after a global pandemic decimated your planet, Orb. Also the absolute last remaining 💪🏻🔬 CHADENTIST🔬💪🏻...use your wits (and muscles) to overcome any obstacle! In this locked bunker, grow the perfect counter-virus that will save the remaining Orbians!

ℹ️ TUTORIAL ℹ️ #LOG 323: Someone left something written on the floor, i reckon i should investigate, might tell me more on the counter-virus formula. There was some commotion, but i can still see part of it ...

🎮 CONTROLS 🎮

  • LMB to order a move
  • RMB to parkour / turbo / fast-move / shortcut over obstacles (check your energy, if it reaches 0 = enjoy death)
  • MMB to cancel all movement in progress
  • SPACE to interact
  • X,C,V,1,2,3,4 for options when interacting with machines
  • Backspace for FULLSCREEN
  • ESC to restart

📝GENERAL HUD TIPS 📝

  • YELLOW button / highlight = instant action
  • GREEN button / highlight = hierarchy action / takes time to do
  • RED button / highlight = cancel
  • GRAY button = can't use now / inactive
  • MACHINE / BUILDINGS colors correspond to the inventory HUD states

🐛KNOWN ISSUES 🐛

  • game can be finished and that's something.jpeg (not the worst issue to have)
  • no viruses (viruses slow you down and contaminate the batch, if you don't do it in the right order)
  • pushing objects feature isn't there yet
  • all timers are fast in this version just so it allows quick gameplay (not intended to be that fast)
  • movement sometimes goes nuts (ESC to restart)
  • can double/triple down on microbe - machine actions
  • need to use a different slot when adding microbes to the next machine (from the last used) to work as intended (it's a bug now but actually half-a-feature)
  • ^ because of this you can pretty much skip the timers and finish the game really fast (not intended of course...)
  • HUD states sometimes don't work as they should
  • can pickup microbes from a different machine then the one you're at
  • can turbo whilst not moving (another bug, turned feature called STRESS)
  • days are much faster on Orb than what we are used to...

Made for GM48 - 36 in 2days.
